archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.5.5d: d) are not made up of all numeric or alpha characters (i.e. passwords contain a combination of at least one alpha character, numeric character and special character)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
